description:
Independent LCD display for speed and time

• Compact footprint

•  Provides smooth and uniform shaking

•  2.5kg with platform speed range  100-800 rpm

•  Continuous or timer operation mode

• Maintenance- free brushless DC motor

• Over speed detection and protection

• Wide range of optional platform for flasks, and other popular vessels

•  Remote function provides PC control and data transmission

•  Free software for PC control & data logging

We provide professional Shakers with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
